reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater versatile, being able to dress it up or down, and appreciate its true-to-size fit with perfect length and wide sleeves. Customers praise its quality, noting it's perfect for spring and fall, and one customer mentions it's suitable for professional wear.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute boho top!
items.body: I absolutely love this top and get so many compliments every time I wear it! The striped design is stylish and flattering, and the lightweight knit makes it perfect for fall or layering as the weather changes. The 3/4 sleeves and crewneck give it a casual yet put-together look that works for everyday wear or casual outings. It’s comfortable, soft, and fits true to size. I’ve paired it with jeans and boots and always feel confident wearing it. Definitely a great addition to my wardrobe! Read more
items.author: Melinda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater!
items.body: I love this sweater! The style is unique with pretty colors. I purchased the "B White". The weight is good for all seasons - love it with shorts or capri pants in spring and summer and it's not too hot with the open(ish) weave. Will be easy to layer for fall. It's super soft and flowy with a roomy fit. The type of sweater that just makes you feel good wearing it. I've only worn it a couple times, but have gotten many compliments. A keeper for sure! Read more
items.author: Jen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy!
items.body: Cute and comfy. Perfect summer weight. Loved the color combo. Went perfectly with a pair of Adidas I bought earlier, and wanted a top that was match y-match y. Read more
items.author: Marsha Messer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this!
items.body: Love this shirt! Soft and comfortable way to dress nice! Read more
items.author: Jen S.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars See-through sweater
items.body: This sweater is transparent, so I had to send it back. The knit is so loose. I liked the style and baggy fit, but even in solid black, I could see everything through it. It wouldn't be work appropriate abd I wouldn't be comfortable out in public with as see-through as it was. Read more
items.author: Sultenfuss

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater! ❤️
items.body: I love this sweater! The color is beautiful, fit, weight and knit are perfection. This is my second purchase and I have the sweater in white. Washes great and it does not shrink. Read more
items.author: CFC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: Good quality. Soft material. Perfect to wear alone or ad a layering piece. Washes and dries without issues Read more
items.author: Susan L.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Nice fit and material. Read more
items.author: Fran J Thompson

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: H Beige, B White 2, B Purple, B Rose, B Black 2, B Gray, H White, C Beige, B Black, B Rose 2, B Beige 2, C Orange, H Black, C Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
